problem_text_cn: 如图,AB是半圆的直径,弦AD,BC相交于P,已知∠DPB=60°,D是弧BC的中点,则tan∠ADC等于()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of the semicircle, the chords AD and BC intersect at P, it is known that ∠DPB = N_0, D is the midpoint of the arc BC, then tan∠ADC is equal to ()
raw_answer:
解:连接AC．∵AB为直径,∴∠ACB=90°．∵∠DPB=∠APC=60°,∴∠CAP=30°．∵D是弧BC的中点,∴∠CAP=∠BAD,∠CAB=60°．∴∠ABC=30°=∠ADC．
则tan∠ADC=\frac{√{3}}{3}．
故选:C．
raw_comment: 本题较难,考查了圆周角定理和特殊角的三角函数值．
